LanguageData.NovaScenario.label: 行星侦察
LanguageData.NovaScenario.description: Your crew and supplies are being dropped in a new unexplored region of this remote planet. Your task is to establish a perimeter, build a permanent habitat and start to explore world. \n\nYou will play for nova race。
LanguageData.NovaScenario.scenario.name: 行星侦察
LanguageData.NovaScenario.scenario.summary: Establish a perimeter, build a habitat and start to explore。
LanguageData.NovaScenario.scenario.description: Your crew and supplies are being dropped in a new unexplored region of this remote planet. Your task is to establish a perimeter, build a permanent habitat and start to explore world. \n\nYou will play for nova race。
